dialog: That's too far out of the way.
I need to go into town, but maybe I can stop on the way back.

option.dialog: Sorry, I wasn't paying attention to where I was walking. Could you tell me where we are right now?
Just a little lost it seems, do you know if there's a town nearby?

dialog: Well, right now we're on the side of the road, haha.
But the proper answer is we're currently in [INSERT PLACE NAME].
There's a town down this road here.
I'm headed that way now to run some errands. I can show you the way, if you'd like.
Yeah, I do actually! I was headed into town to run some errands.
You're more than welcome to tag along.
Oh, where are my manners? I forgot to introduce myself!
I'm Tate, and it's nice to meet you!
See that mountain? You can buy it.
(In a DLC for the price of a real mountain.)
I can't go in here right now.
